My Artistic Side I — Watercolor Flowers and Landscape

01 Jun 2015

In this blog, I will share with you some of my amateur watercolor paintings on flowers and landscape.

Every year, I would include "try something new" as one item in the new year's resolutions. Last year, it turns out that I ran 12 km for the first time and this year, the story goes on to drawing some watercolor paintings to decorate my home!

Painting is such a relaxing and rewarding creative procedure and it can change the way you see the world!
